SimGauge.Gauge.Comment:
For Lago AMX FuelQty gauge - units = Kg. Default readout fuse cell = CENTER
Fuel_Qty_Selected buttons: 0= default, show fuselage tank CENTER 1= LW, show left wing tank LEFT MAIN 2= RW, show right wing tank RIGHT MAIN 3= LUW, show left underwing tank EXTERNAL1 (seems outb droptanks LEFT AUX /RIGHT AUX are not shown) 4= RUW, show right underwing tank EXTERNAL2
Warning LL FUEL: below 300 Kg - 99 Gallon
